replies.author: 一梦入神宫.
replies.txt_content: 输入/papi ecloud download PlayerPoints安装点券变量 然后点券变量 %playerpoints_points%

replies.author: Qwe_Sakura
replies.txt_content:
先输入papi ecloud download PlayerPoints
然后找到%playerpoints_points%
再重启服务器或者重新加载插件
